name: Vertigo FPS
description: VertigoFPS is first person shooter game. Player is able to "leap" to any side of the wall or floor and have got total vertigo in the head. This allow player to experiment with point of view and with perspective in this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: Vista SP1 (64-bit), 7 (64-bit), 8 (64-bit), 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.5 Ghz Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series 512 MB video card or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
